flights.notes: Directly with airlines or through Amex Travel

benefits.description: Access to premium seats for select events

car-rental.description: Collision Damage Waiver (CDW) or Theft, $50,000 per agreement, secondary coverage

baggage-loss.description: $1,250 for carry-on baggage, $500 for checked baggage

purchase.description: Reimburses up to $10,000 per purchase for loss within 90 days of purchase

extended-warranty.description: Extends the original manufacturer’s warranty up to one year

services.title: Global Assist® Hotline
services.description: 24/7 emergency assistance when traveling more than 100 miles from home

services.title: Send & Split®
services.description: Split the bill with friends and send money with Venmo or PayPal

penalty.notes: Variable, applied if late or returned payment

benefits.description: Instacart+ members get $15 statement credits each quarter through July 2024

benefits.title: Additional Redeemed Value
benefits.description: Get 25% more value when redeemed on Chase Travel

travel-delay.description: More than 12 hours, unreimbursed expenses only, $500 per ticket

baggage-delay.description: More than 6 hours, $100 per delay day, 5 days max

purchase.description: Reimburses up to $500 per claim for loss within 120 days of purchase
